thread.title: US credit cards take fees for refugee crowdfunding

title: US credit cards take fees for refugee crowdfunding
text:
Published By: Al Jazeera - Today 
Kickstarter is waiving fees for crowdfunding campaign for Syrian refugees but credit card companies still take a cut....
